summary: This document appears to be a client relationship agreement and margin agreement from UBS, outlining the terms and conditions for account management, including margin privileges and electronic delivery consent. It includes references to the responsibilities of the account holder and the financial advisor.

persons.name: Scott Stedman
persons.context: Scott Stedman is mentioned as the financial advisor responsible for the accounts referenced in the document.

persons.name: Lyle Casnel
persons.context: Lyle Casnel is also mentioned as a financial advisor associated with the accounts in the document.

keyFacts: The document includes a pre-dispute arbitration clause.
It outlines the responsibilities of the account holder regarding margin privileges.
The document mentions electronic delivery of agreements and disclosures.
Scott Stedman and Lyle Casnel are identified as financial advisors for the accounts.
Certain types of accounts are excluded from margin privileges.
